@comment {
    This is a bibtex example of a comment,
    it can span lines and ends with the matching closing curly bracket.
}
@article{
    myarticlekey,
    author = "R. S. Doiel",
    jounral = {Robert's Vanity Journal of Software Works},
    year = 2016,
    blahblah = {
        this is  just a bunch of text
        on different lines
        and would normally be ignored by BibTeX tools
    }
}
